title: Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Alternate Design Sketch, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Serving Table with Alternate Design Sketch
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right corner: Serving Table / of Mahogany, and: Top 4.'6" x 2'.3".  Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: $75.00, along left edge of central design, numerical notations, and upper center of sheet: 60 x 30
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Narrow rectangular body raised on solid double-scroll side supports; lower shelf attached half way above floor; upper left corner, alternate design with body raised on 4 scrolling legs.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Alternate Design Sketch, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-64
